description: Metadata schema for microstructure-sensitive mechanical data

identifier.description: Name of the data object, serving as the unique identifier.

title.description: The title of the data object or the project where the data object is part of it.

creator.description: The user responsible for generating the data object, formatted as 'Last name, First name'.

creator_ORCID.description: The ORCID ID of the creator. Multiple ORCID IDs are inserted as a list.

creator_affiliation.description: The organizational affiliation of the creator. Multiple affiliations are inserted as a list.

creator_institute.description: The specific institute within the organization to which the creator belongs.

creator_group.description: The group within the organization associated with the creator.

contributor.description: Individuals who have contributed significantly to the data generation process.

contributor_ORCID.description: The ORCID ID of the contributor. Multiple ORCID IDs are separated by commas.

contributor_affiliation.description: The organizational affiliation of the contributor. Multiple affiliations are inserted as a list.

contributor_institute.description: The specific institute within the organization to which the contributor belongs.

contributor_group.description: The group within the organization associated with the contributor.

date.description: The date when the data generation process started in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

shared_with.description: Specifies who can access the data object, including categories such as creator, specific users, groups, or public.

description.description: A free-text description of the data object.

rights.description: The license under which the dataset is made available.

rights_holder.description: The person or organization managing rights over the resource.

funder_name.description: The name of the funding provider.

fund_identifier.description: The project identifier provided by the funding agency or body.

publisher.description: The entity responsible for making the dataset available.

relation.description: Any resource related to or associated with the dataset.

user_extra_information.description: Additional user details or information relevant to the data object.

keywords.description: Words that highlight the main topics or concepts of the data object.

software.description: Names of the software or computational tool used for running the simulation.

software_version.description: Specifies the version number of the software or computational tool used for running the simulation.

system.description: The name of the operating system where the data was generated.

system_version.description: Specifies the version of the operating system.

processor_specifications.description: The technical characteristics of the processor.

input_path.description: The relative file path or directory where input data files required to run the simulation or analysis are stored.

results_path.description: The file path or directory where the results of the simulation or analysis are stored.

system_extra_information.description: Additional system-related details or information relevant to the data object.

RVE_size.description: Represents the dimensions of the RVE in the form: length, width, height.

RVE_continuity.description: Describes whether the RVE has periodic or non-periodic boundary conditions.

discretization_type.description: Indicates that the discretization uses a regular, grid-like pattern ('Structured') or an irregular pattern ('Unstructured').

discretization_unit_size.description: Specifies the average physical size of discrete units within the RVE, determining the resolution and level of detail.

discretization_count.description: Total number of discrete units in the RVE.

software.description: The software used to generate geometry.

software_version.description: The version of the software used.

system.description: The system on which the geometry was generated.

input_path.description: The file path where the input data is stored.

results_path.description: The file path where the results are stored.

origin.description: Information about the tool used to generate geometry.

vertex_list.description: A list includes vertex/vertices that describe a point, edge, or face.

constraints.description: Defines the constraints for each direction (x, y, z) as either 'free', 'fixed', or 'loaded'.

loading_type.description: Define the type of load applied.

loading_mode.description: Specify the nature of the loading condition with respect to time.

magnitude.description: The magnitude of the applied load.

frequency.description: The frequency of the applied load (optional).

duration.description: The duration of the applied load (optional).

R.description: Value for R relevant to the loading condition (optional).

items.description: Contains the values of the applied load in the specified directions.
Defines mechanical boundary conditions including vertex lists, constraints, loading types, and applied loads.

vertex_list.description: A list includes vertex/vertices that describe a point, edge, or face.

constraints.description: Defines the constraints for each direction (x, y, z) as either 'free', 'fixed', or 'loaded'.

loading_mode.description: Specifies the nature of the thermal loading condition with respect to time.

magnitude.description: The magnitude of the thermal load.

frequency.description: The frequency of the thermal load (optional).

duration.description: The duration of the thermal load (optional).

items.description: Contains the values of the applied thermal load.
Defines thermal boundary conditions including vertex lists, constraints, loading modes, and applied loads.

plastic_parameters.description: Plastic properties of the material, including hardening, specific to the material.

hardening_model_name.description: Name of the hardening model (if applicable).

hardening_parameters.description: Parameters specific to the hardening model (if applicable).

constitutive_model.description: Defines the constitutive model for the material, including elastic and plastic properties.

euler_angles.description: The orientation of each grain given as Euler angles in active rotation from global coordinates.

grain_count.description: The total number of material grains, equal to the number of orientation angles.

orientation_identifier.description: Hash or identifier for the orientation.

frame.description: The coordinate system used for the orientation data: 'lab' or 'material'.

rotation_type.description: Specifies whether the rotation is described as 'active' (physical rotation of the grain) or 'passive' (rotation of the coordinate system).

software.description: Name of the software or tools used to generate orientation.

software_version.description: The version of the software used to generate orientation.

orientation.description: Describes the material's orientation, including Euler angles, grain count, and texture type.

items.description: Material definition including constitutive model and orientation.

stress.description: Stress data throughout the simulation in the global coordinate system.

S11.description: List of stress values in direction 11 throughout the simulation.

S22.description: List of stress values in direction 22 throughout the simulation.

S33.description: List of stress values in direction 33 throughout the simulation.

S12.description: List of stress values in direction 12 throughout the simulation.

S13.description: List of stress values in direction 13 throughout the simulation.

S23.description: List of stress values in direction 23 throughout the simulation.

equivalent_stress.description: List of equivalent stress values throughout the simulation.

total_strain.description: Total strain data throughout the simulation in the global coordinate system.

E11.description: List of total strain values in direction 11 throughout the simulation.

E22.description: List of total strain values in direction 22 throughout the simulation.

E33.description: List of total strain values in direction 33 throughout the simulation.

E12.description: List of total strain values in direction 12 throughout the simulation.

E13.description: List of total strain values in direction 13 throughout the simulation.

E23.description: List of total strain values in direction 23 throughout the simulation.

equivalent_strain.description: List of equivalent strain values throughout the simulation.

plastic_strain.description: Plastic strain data throughout the simulation in the global coordinate system.

Ep11.description: List of plastic strain values in direction 11 throughout the simulation.

Ep22.description: List of plastic strain values in direction 22 throughout the simulation.

Ep33.description: List of plastic strain values in direction 33 throughout the simulation.

Ep12.description: List of plastic strain values in direction 12 throughout the simulation.

Ep13.description: List of plastic strain values in direction 13 throughout the simulation.

Ep23.description: List of plastic strain values in direction 23 throughout the simulation.

equivalent_plastic_strain.description: List of equivalent plastic strain values throughout the simulation.

units.description: Units and conversion factors to SI for different physical quantities.

Stress.description: Unit of stress, default is MPa.

Length.description: Unit of length, default is mm.

Angle.description: Unit of angle, default is Radians.

Temperature.description: Unit of temperature, default is Kelvin.
